snippet: Mobile diary-writers can get reminders and other tools to create entries and enhance them with information; some apps allow sharing over social media.
abstract: Kit Eaton App Smart column highlights  journal- and diary-writing apps.
lead_paragraph: Mobile diary-writers can get reminders and other tools to create entries and enhance them with information; some apps allow sharing over social media.

headline.print_headline: Some Inspiration for Journal Writers, and Maybe a Nudge
headline.main: Video Feature: Apps Give Journal Writers Inspiration, and Maybe a Nudge
